```{r include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>", echo=TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(volker)
theme_set(theme_bw())

data <- volker::chatgpt


# Recode -9 to NA
data <- mutate(data, across(starts_with("cg_adoption_"), ~ na_if(.,-9)  ))

# Add label to sd_alter
data <- set_item_labels(data, tibble("sd_alter","Alter")) 

```

## 1. One variable


### Frequency plot for one categorical variable: Gender
```{r results='asis'}

plot_var_counts(data, sd_geschlecht)

```


## 2. Multiple items

### Frequency plot for multiple categorical variables: Adoption factors
```{r results='asis'}

plot_item_counts(data, starts_with("cg_adoption_"))

```

## 3. Two variables (one being categorical)

### Stacked frequency plot of categorical variables: Innovator type by gender

```{r results='asis'}

plot_group_counts(data, in_adoption, sd_geschlecht)

```
